# datapower_documentcryptomap (Data Source)

Document Crypto Map

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "datapower_documentcryptomap" "test" {
  depends_on = [datapower_documentcryptomap.test]
  app_domain = "acc_test_domain"
}
```
